thread.title: Remy Ma Performs "ShETHER" Live For The First Time
thread.title_full: Remy Ma Performs "ShETHER" Live For The First Time

author: Shaun M
title: Remy Ma Performs "ShETHER" Live For The First Time
text:
Home > Music > Remy Ma Performs "ShETHER" Live For The First Time Remy Ma Performs "ShETHER" Live For The First Time 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 27, 2017 at 10:19am Remy Ma performs "ShETHER" live at the Hip Hop and Soul Concert. 
Remy Ma joined Lil Kim , Cardi B and The Lox at the Hip Hop and Soul Concert, where she unleashed "ShETHER" to her hungry fans. The show took place in Reading, Pennsylvania last Saturday. The self-proclaimed Queen of NY put out the Nicki Minaj diss record the day after Nicki took shots at her on Gucci Mane 's " Make Love ." 
"I don't want to hear about your records and big numbers," Remy said during the show. "'Cause I was up top, seven winters and six summers." 
People are still reeling from the savage diss track and videos of the event are circulating online. At one point, its seems like Remy forgets the words to the song but that would be normal considering she just penned it. 
Nicki has yet to responded to Remy. She had a Twitter squabble with Trey Songz the day "ShETHER" came out. when you see @remyma in concert the same day she BODIED @nickiminaj #shETHER 😩😭🙌🏾 pic.twitter.com/V2TVYdl5CJ
